# About the Book

## Application of double cross-fit TMLE to estimate Right Heart Catheterization's effect on hospital stay

Momenul Haque Mondol & Ehsan Karim

### Description

This book describes the step-wise implementation of double cross-fit TMLE and AIPW in Right Heart Catheterization (RHC) data.

### How to cite

Mondol MH, Karim ME (2024) "Application of double cross-fit doubly robust estimators to estimate Right Heart Catheterization's effect on hospital stay", URL: https://github.com/momenulhaque/DC-double-robust-methods-for-RHC-data
